jparsec.model

Class RotationalDiagram

  • java.lang.Object
    • jparsec.model.RotationalDiagram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RotationalDiagram
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A class to perform calculations using LTE for rotational diagrams.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    T. Alonso Albi - OAN (Spain)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double[] area
      Line area in K km/s.
      double[] area_error
      Area error.
      boolean beamFilling
      Set to true if beam filling was used in the input data, so that the areas are corrected if obtainAreaFromFit(String) is called.
      java.lang.String chartTitle
      Labels for the chart, default value if it is null.
      java.lang.String chartXLabel
      Labels for the chart, default value if it is null.
      java.lang.String chartYLabel
      Labels for the chart, default value if it is null.
      double forceTrot
      Rotational temperature in K.
      boolean jpl_cat
      True if JPL catalog is used, false for COLOGNE.
      java.lang.String mol
      Molecule string as given from JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.
      java.lang.String molname
      Name of the molecule and transitions in the catalog.
      double partitionFunction
      Value of the partition function for the molecule at the rotational temperature.
      java.lang.String predictedAreas
      Optional String to set additional data about the LTE predicted areas.
      boolean spline
      True to use spline interpolation, false for linear interpolation.
      java.lang.String title
      Internal title to identify the rotational diagram.
      java.lang.String[] tran
      Transition string as given from JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.
      java.lang.String[] tranname
      Name of the molecule and transitions in the catalog.
      double[] width
      Width of the line.
      static double WIDTH_NO_AVERAGE
      ID for an input width to disable any averaging for the transitions found around a given frequency.

    • Field Detail

      • mol

        public java.lang.String mol
        Molecule string as given from JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.

      • tran

        public java.lang.String[] tran
        Transition string as given from JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.

      • jpl_cat

        public boolean jpl_cat
        True if JPL catalog is used, false for COLOGNE.

      • spline

        public boolean spline
        True to use spline interpolation, false for linear interpolation.

      • area

        public double[] area
        Line area in K km/s.

      • area_error

        public double[] area_error
        Area error.

      • forceTrot

        public double forceTrot
        Rotational temperature in K.

      • width

        public double[] width
        Width of the line. If more than one transition for a given molecule exists at frequency around width/2 from the transition frequency, the intensity will be automatically scaled properly.

      • partitionFunction

        public double partitionFunction
        Value of the partition function for the molecule at the rotational temperature.

      • title

        public java.lang.String title
        Internal title to identify the rotational diagram.

      • predictedAreas

        public java.lang.String predictedAreas
        Optional String to set additional data about the LTE predicted areas.

      • beamFilling

        public boolean beamFilling
        Set to true if beam filling was used in the input data, so that the areas are corrected if obtainAreaFromFit(String) is called. This flag is only used in that function, other calculations will not change.

      • WIDTH_NO_AVERAGE

        public static final double WIDTH_NO_AVERAGE
        ID for an input width to disable any averaging for the transitions found around a given frequency.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • molname

        public java.lang.String molname
        Name of the molecule and transitions in the catalog.

      • tranname

        public java.lang.String[] tranname
        Name of the molecule and transitions in the catalog.

      • chartTitle

        public java.lang.String chartTitle
        Labels for the chart, default value if it is null.

      • chartXLabel

        public java.lang.String chartXLabel
        Labels for the chart, default value if it is null.

      • chartYLabel

        public java.lang.String chartYLabel
        Labels for the chart, default value if it is null.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RotationalDiagram

        public RotationalDiagram()
        Empty constructor.

      • RotationalDiagram

        public RotationalDiagram(java.lang.String mol_name,
                 java.lang.String tran_name,
                 boolean jpl_cat,
                 boolean spline,
                 double area,
                 double area_error,
                 double Trot,
                 double width)
                  throws JPARSECException
        Explicit constructor for one point.
        Parameters:
        mol_name - Molecule name as given by JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.
        tran_name - Transition name as given by JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.
        jpl_cat - True if JPL catalog is used, false for COLOGNE.
        spline - True to use spline interpolation, false for linear interpolation.
        area - Line area in K km/s.
        area_error - Area error.
        Trot - Rotational temperature in K.
        width - Width of the line.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • RotationalDiagram

        public RotationalDiagram(java.lang.String mol_name,
                 java.lang.String[] tran_names,
                 boolean jpl_cat,
                 boolean spline,
                 double[] area,
                 double[] area_error,
                 double[] width)
                  throws JPARSECException
        Explicit general constructor.
        Parameters:
        mol_name - Molecule name as given by JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.
        tran_names - Transition name array as given by JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.
        jpl_cat - True if JPL catalog is used, false for COLOGNE.
        spline - True to use spline interpolation, false for linear interpolation.
        area - Array of line areas in K km/s.
        area_error - Array of area error.
        width - Width of the lines.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • RotationalDiagram

        public RotationalDiagram(java.lang.String mol_name,
                 java.lang.String tran_name,
                 boolean jpl_cat,
                 boolean spline,
                 double area,
                 double area_error,
                 double Trot)
                  throws JPARSECException
        Explicit constructor for one point.
        Parameters:
        mol_name - Molecule name as given by JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.
        tran_name - Transition name as given by JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.
        jpl_cat - True if JPL catalog is used, false for COLOGNE.
        spline - True to use spline interpolation, false for linear interpolation.
        area - Line area in K km/s.
        area_error - Area error.
        Trot - Rotational temperature in K.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • RotationalDiagram

        public RotationalDiagram(java.lang.String mol_name,
                 java.lang.String[] tran_names,
                 boolean jpl_cat,
                 boolean spline,
                 double[] area,
                 double[] area_error)
                  throws JPARSECException
        Explicit general constructor.
        Parameters:
        mol_name - Molecule name as given by JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.
        tran_names - Transition name array as given by JPL or COLOGNE catalogs.
        jpl_cat - True if JPL catalog is used, false for COLOGNE.
        spline - True to use spline interpolation, false for linear interpolation.
        area - Array of line areas in K km/s.
        area_error - Array of area error.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • obtainAreaFromFit

        public double obtainAreaFromFit(java.lang.String tran)
        Returns the predicted area of a given transition assuming LTE, using the results from the fit to the rotational diagram.
        Parameters:
        tran - The transition data.
        Returns:
        The area in K km/s.

      • getMaximumFrequency

        public double getMaximumFrequency()
        Returns the maximum frequency in this rotational diagram. When beam filling factor is applied, the area in each point is multiplied by (freq/max)^2, where freq is the frequency at that transition and max is the maximum frequency (=> x (minimum beam/beam)^2).
        Returns:
        Maximum frequency in GHz.

      • obtainUpperLimitToAbundance

        public double[] obtainUpperLimitToAbundance(double beam_area,
                                   double distance,
                                   double distance_error,
                                   double disk_mass,
                                   double disk_mass_error)
                                     throws JPARSECException
        Obtains an upper limit to the abundance of certain molecule.
        Parameters:
        beam_area - Beam area in arcseconds^2.
        distance - Distance to object in pc.
        distance_error - Error in distance.
        disk_mass - Mass of the disk in solar masses.
        disk_mass_error - Error in the mass of the disk.
        Returns:
        An array with the upper limit to abundance (relative to H2 = 1), and it's error.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • obtainUpperLimitToMass

        public double[] obtainUpperLimitToMass(double beam_area,
                              double distance,
                              double distance_error,
                              double abundance)
                                throws JPARSECException
        Obtains an upper limit to the abundance of certain molecule.
        Parameters:
        beam_area - Beam area in arcseconds^2.
        distance - Distance to object in pc.
        distance_error - Error in distance.
        abundance - Abundance of the molecule.
        Returns:
        An array with the upper limit to mass and it's error.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • getColumnDensity

        public double getColumnDensity()
        Obtains column density.
        Returns:
        Column density in cm^-2.

      • getColumnDensityError

        public double getColumnDensityError()
        Obtains column density error.
        Returns:
        Column density error in cm^-2.

      • getXErrors

        public double[] getXErrors()
        Obtains x errors for the rotational diagram.
        Returns:
        X errors.

      • getYErrors

        public double[] getYErrors()
        Obtains y errors for the rotational diagram.
        Returns:
        Y errors.

      • getX

        public double[] getX()
        Obtains x for the rotational diagram.
        Returns:
        X values in K.

      • getY

        public double[] getY()
        Obtains y for the rotational diagram.
        Returns:
        Y values, Log(Nu/gu).

      • getTrot

        public double getTrot()
        Obtains the rotational temperature.
        Returns:
        Rotational temperature in K.

      • getTrotError

        public double getTrotError()
        Obtains the rotational temperature error.
        Returns:
        Rotational temperature error in K.

      • getPartitionFunction

        public double getPartitionFunction()
        Partition function of the molecule.
        Returns:
        Partition function.

      • getLabels

        public java.lang.String[] getLabels()
        Obtains the labels for the points in the rotational diagram.
        Returns:
        Labels, defined as upper transition - lower transition.

      • getChart

        public CreateChart getChart(java.lang.String title,
                   int width,
                   int height,
                   boolean logScaleX,
                   boolean logScaleY)
                     throws JPARSECException
        Obtains a chart with the rotational diagram.
        Parameters:
        title - The default title of the chart.
        width - Chart width.
        height - Chart height.
        logScaleX - True for log scale in x axis.
        logScaleY - True fot log scale in y axis.
        Returns:
        The chart.
        Throws:
        JPARSECException - If an error occurs.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        For unit testing only.
        Parameters:
        args - Not used.
